message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for sale. I'm looking to sell it to you for $150. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $135, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $125 and $135, so I can offer it to you for $130. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I'm getting close to your offer, but I'm still not comfortable with $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125 again?
